LBrown_Brown_External0001_description.defaultValue: Document library to share documentation with external guests.

LInsurance_Loss_Estim0005_description.defaultValue: Document library of links to divisional insurance loss estimates.

LInvoices0006_description.defaultValue: Library for AP to upload invoices associated with 2025 Flood Damage Event projects

LQuotes_and_Supportin0007_description.defaultValue: Document library used to store quotes and supporting documentation such as photos for the 2025 Flood Damage Event.

LRisk_Management_Refe0008_description.defaultValue: Collection of links and references for Risk Management.
